main event: Several civilians observed 15-20 round, gray objects moving in an uncontrolled pattern over Colorado Springs in 1964.
interesting points: The objects were reported to be 33-35 feet in size, about the size of a grapefruit.
The objects appeared to remain close to the ground and did not have any visible source of propulsion.
The objects exhibited slight changes in elevation, rising and dipping slightly, which may have been due to atmospheric effects.
Two of the objects descended quite rapidly and disappeared from view.
The sighting lasted for approximately 5 minutes.
